refnamediv.refpurpose: Transfer control during the i-time pass.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: During the i-time pass only, unconditionally transfer control to the statement labeled by label.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: where label is in the same instrument block and is not an expression.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the igoto opcode. It uses the file igoto.csd.
Example of the igoto opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like this:
instr 1: iparam = 0.000 instr 1: ifreq = 440.000 instr 1: iparam = 1.000 instr 1: ifreq = 880.000
